actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Courts and Administrative Practice.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Courts and Administrative Practice

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the United States Code to provide that the actual and necessary expenses incurred by creditors' and equity security holders' committees in making a substantial contribution to a case under chapter 11 may be paid as administrative expenses.

summary.text: Amends Federal bankruptcy law to allow as administrative expenses the actual and necessary costs incurred by creditors' and equity security holders' committees in making a substantial contribution to a bankruptcy case.

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the United States Code to provide that the actual and necessary expenses incurred by creditors' and equity security holders' committees in making a substantial contribution to a case under chapter 11 may be paid as administrative expenses.
